Begini Modus Penculikan WN Inggris dan Peran 4 Oknum Polisi yang Diamankan
03 Nov 2019, 20:32 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Empat oknum polisi diamankan dalam kasus penculikan WN Inggris. Begini modus penculikan dan empat peran oknum polisi tersebut.
Dalam kasus yang berawal dari laporan polisi bernomor LP/7002/X/2019/PMJ/Ditreskrimum tertanggal 31 Oktober 2019 dengan pelapor VL, rekan Matthew itu, Kabid Humas Polda Metro Jaya Kombes Argo Yuwono, Minggu (3/11/2019) mengatakan ada 6 pelaku yang turut serta melakukan aksi kejahatan itu. Empat pelaku diantaranya merupakan anggota Polri.
Kasus bermula ketika korban Matthew, pada 29 Oktober 2019, memberi tahu rekannya yakni VL bahwa dia ingin bertemu seseorang terkait urusan pekerjaan. Pada 30 Oktober 2019 pukul 02.00 WIB, korban memberitahukan kepada VL sudah dalam perjalanan pulang dan ternyata diketahui diculik dengan para pelaku meminta tebusan sekitar USD 1 juta.
VL lantas membuat laporan pada Kamis (31/10/2019) sekitar pukul 08.00 WIB dan Ditreskrimum Polda Metro Jaya kemudian menindaklanjutinya. Sekitar pukul 13.00 WIB di kawasan Kemayoran, Jakarta Pusat, para pelaku ditangkap.
"Pelaku pertama atas nama G selaku rekan kerja korban. G meminta kekasihnya yang berinisial NA untuk merencanakan aksi penculikan itu," kata Kombes Argo saat dikonfirmasi detikcom.
NA diketahui ikut merencanakan penculikan itu dan mengajak Bripda JBB, anggota Cyber Bareskrim Polri, yang juga saudara NA, untuk memuluskan aksi penculikan ini. Bripda JBB berperan menyiapkan mobil dan membuntuti kendaraan korban.
"J anggota Cyber Bareskrim Polri menyiapkan mobil dan melakukan cek posisi keberadaan korban," jelas Argo.

This Is The Mode Of Abducting British Citizens And The Role Of 4 Police Officers Secured
03 Nov 2019, 20:32 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Four police officers were secured in the kidnapping case of British citizens. This is the mode of kidnapping and the four roles of the police officers.
In a case that began with a police report numbered LP / 7002 / X / 2019 / PMJ / Ditreskrimum dated 31 October 2019 with the VL reporter, Matthew's colleague, the Head of Metro Jaya Police Public Relations Commissioner Argo Yuwono, Sunday (3/11/2019) said there was 6 perpetrators who participated in the crime. Four of them are members of the National Police.
The case began when the victim Matthew, on October 29, 2019, told his colleague VL that he wanted to meet someone related to work matters. On 30 October 2019 at 02.00 WIB, the victim told VL that he was on his way home and it was found that he had been kidnapped with the perpetrators asking for a ransom of around USD 1 million.
VL then made a report on Thursday (10/31/2019) around 08.00 WIB and the Jakarta Police Directorate General Criminal Investigation then followed up on it. At around 1:00 pm West Indonesian Time in the Kemayoran area, Central Jakarta, the perpetrators were arrested.
"The first perpetrator on behalf of G as the victim's co-worker. G asked his girlfriend who had the initials NA to plan the kidnapping action," said Commissioner Argo when confirmed AFP.
NA is known to have participated in planning the abduction and invited Bripda JBB, a member of the Cyber Criminal Investigation Police, who is also NA's brother, to facilitate this kidnapping action. JBB's role is preparing the car and trailing the victim's vehicle.
"A member of the Cyber Criminal Investigation Police prepared a car and checked the position of the victim," Argo explained.
